image.alt: Justia’s Virtual Create Your Own Pizza Party

description: The countdown is on! Thank you to all who signed up for this culinary experience. Get ready to brush up on your kitchen skills, display your creativity, and turn into a world-class chef. Do not miss the hour and date: Wednesday, February 10th, at 3:00 P.M. PST.

The time has come for our traditional Justia Super Bowl Challenge experience. Do you think you know who will win Super Bowl LV? Make your prediction and win a $100 Amazon gift card. Participate and become the new Super Bowl Challenge Champion! The deadline for returning David’s completed email is Thursday, February 4th at 12:00 P.M. PST.
